com.se.simplicity.scenegraph
Class SimpleSceneGraph

java.lang.Object
  com.se.simplicity.scenegraph.SimpleSceneGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneGraph, java.io.Serializable
public class SimpleSceneGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements SceneGraph, java.io.Serializable

This implementation uses only simple scene graph techniques and properties.

Gary Buyn

Method Detail

addSubgraph

public void addSubgraph(Node subgraphRoot)
Description copied from interface: SceneGraph

Adds a subgraph to the SceneGraph. The subgraph must be a tree type graph. The SceneGraph will determine where to add the subgraph depending on the internal structure it maintains.

This method should be called instead of retrieving the root Node of the SceneGraph and manually adding a subgraph to maintain the integrity of the SceneGraph.

Specified by:
addSubgraph in interface SceneGraph
Parameters:
subgraphRoot - The root Node of the subgraph to add.

addSubgraph

public void addSubgraph(Node subgraphRoot,
                        Node parent)
Description copied from interface: SceneGraph

Adds a subgraph to the SceneGraph. The subgraph must be a tree type graph.

This method should be called instead of retrieving the root Node of the SceneGraph and manually adding a subgraph to maintain the integrity of the SceneGraph.

Specified by:
addSubgraph in interface SceneGraph
Parameters:
subgraphRoot - The root Node of the subgraph to add.
parent - The Node within the SceneGraph to add the subgraph under.

removeSubgraph

public void removeSubgraph(Node subgraphRoot)
Description copied from interface: SceneGraph

Removes a subgraph from the SceneGraph.

This method should be called instead of retrieving the root Node of the subgraph and manually removing it from its parent to maintain the integrity of the SceneGraph.

Specified by:
removeSubgraph in interface SceneGraph
Parameters:
subgraphRoot - The root Node of the subgraph to remove.
